name: cyberguard-ai
description: Advanced cybersecurity assistant with AI-powered vulnerability analysis

scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.start: node -e "console.log('Use npm run dev to start both servers or npm run backend/frontend for individual services')"
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start the application.'

author: CyberGuard Team
